availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander Milton Cockrill (Caldwell & Christian Co, KY, resident )

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, resident. Illinois native. Married to Mary E. Darby Cockrill. Father of Franklin N. Cockrill and William M. Cockrill. Resident of Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Lyon County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 445A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 470B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Missouri, Jefferson County, Johnson, p. 441A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994046, Lyon County Births.
"Rev Alexander Milton Cockrill (1835-1921)," Find A Grave, Memorial #17974160, accessed September 9, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/17974160.
